Payroll.Employee

    • Uses of Employee in Payroll

      Subclasses of Employee in Payroll 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Fulltime
      Extension of employee class, allows for creation of a fulltime employee.
      class  Management
      Extension of Employee and Fulltime classes.
      class  Parttime
      Extends the employee class and includes specific data and operations to a parttime employee.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Company.add(Employee employee)
      Adds an employee to the employee list array.
      private boolean Company.deptCheck(Employee first, Employee second)
      Checks if an employee (first) has a department that comes lexicographically before another employee's (second).
      private int Company.find(Employee employee)
      Searches employee list to find index of an employee.
      private boolean Company.isOlder(Employee first, Employee second)
      Helper method that compares the hire dates of two employees.
      boolean Company.remove(Employee employee)
      Removes an employee from the employee list.
      boolean Company.setHours(Employee employee)
      Sets Hours of a parttime employee to the hours value provided.
